entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
